gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
or
VB
with
TO-INF

sense.def:
To demand something
pomeni zelo ostro za nekaj prositi.

seg.quote: I demand to see a doctor.
She had been demanding that he visit her.

sense.def:
To demand
pomeni tudi ostro postaviti vprašanje.

Če neko delo ali položaj
demands something
, je tista stvar za delo ali položaj potrebna.

seg.quote: He has most of the qualities demanded of a leader.

sense.def:
Kadar se pojavi
demand for something
, veliko ljudi hoče nekaj kupiti ali imeti.

seg.quote: The demand for health care is unlimited.

sense.def:
The demands of an activity, process, or situation
so stvari, ki jih je treba storiti ali dobaviti za neko dejavnost, postopek ali položaj.

seg.quote: The body's fuel demands are very low.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
makes demands on someone
, od nekoga zahteva, da naredi nekaj, za kar potroši veliko časa, moči ali denarja.

seg.quote: The system has always made heavy demands on those working in it.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in demand
, veliko ljudi želi tisto kupiti ali imeti.

Kadar je nekaj na voljo
on demand
, tisto lahko dobimo, če za to zaprosimo.
